title: Bitcoin Dominance Steady, XRP On-Chain Surges, Solana Outperforms—Is Altcoin Season Starting?
description: Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) is holding its ground while activity shifts toward networks showing real usage. XRP’s (CRYPTO: XRP) ledger just hit a 180-day transaction high, Solana (CRYPTO: SOL) is quietly outperforming on throughput and returns near $145, and capital appears to be rotating to altcoins rather than rushing. This setup has reopened the altcoin season ...
